Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/topTables-methods.R
topTables.Rd

Top Tables of Differential Expression Results

topTables(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqResults
topTables(object, n = 50L, coding = FALSE)

# S4 method for list
topTables(object, n = 50L, coding = FALSE)

Arguments

object

DESeqResults or list. For list method, must use resultsTables() return.
...

Additional arguments.
n

scalar integer. Number genes to report.
coding

boolean. Whether to only return coding genes.

Value

kable.

See also

Other R Markdown Functions: prepareRNASeqTemplate

Examples

# DESeqResults ====
# Minimal return
topTables(res_small, n = 5L)
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |
#> |:------------------|--------:|:----|:---------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000024164 |    12562|8.27 |3.89e-194 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |    69340|5.36 |9.03e-76  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |     3560|4.08 |7.16e-45  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |     3544|3.56 |3.87e-42  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |     3002|3.74 |1.63e-37  |
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |
#> |:------------------|--------:|:-----|:--------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000027199 |    11624|-2.31 |9.65e-13 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000005980 |     5795|-2.72 |1.10e-12 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000049152 |    13888|-1.72 |6.78e-11 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |    14806|-1.65 |1.90e-10 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000061906 |     7413|-1.98 |7.50e-10 |

# `resultsTables()` return list ====
# Return with gene annotations and DESeq2 normalized counts
res_tbl <- resultsTables(
    results = res_small,
    counts = dds_small
)
#> 
#> 
#> ## treatment folic acid vs control
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> ### Summary statistics
#> 
#> 
#> - 500 genes in counts matrix
#> - Base mean > 0: 500 genes (non-zero)
#> - Base mean > 1: 500 genes
#> - Alpha: 0.1
#> - LFC threshold: 0
#> - DEG pass alpha: 254 genes
#> - DEG LFC up: 115 genes
#> - DEG LFC down: 139 genes
#> 
topTables(res_tbl, n = 5L)
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             |geneName |geneBiotype    | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |description                           |
#> |:------------------|:--------|:--------------|--------:|:----|:---------|:-------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000024164 |C3       |protein_coding |    12562|8.27 |3.89e-194 |complement component 3                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |Spp1     |protein_coding |    69340|5.36 |9.03e-76  |secreted phosphoprotein 1             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |Cp       |protein_coding |     3560|4.08 |7.16e-45  |ceruloplasmin                         |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |Clu      |protein_coding |     3544|3.56 |3.87e-42  |clusterin                             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |Havcr1   |protein_coding |     3002|3.74 |1.63e-37  |hepatitis A virus cellular receptor 1 |
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             |geneName |geneBiotype    | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |description                                                        |
#> |:------------------|:--------|:--------------|--------:|:-----|:--------|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000027199 |Gatm     |protein_coding |    11624|-2.31 |9.65e-13 |glycine amidinotransferase (L-arginine:glycine amidinotransferase) |
#> |ENSMUSG00000005980 |Dnase1   |protein_coding |     5795|-2.72 |1.10e-12 |deoxyribonuclease I                                                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000049152 |Ugt3a2   |protein_coding |    13888|-1.72 |6.78e-11 |UDP glycosyltransferases 3 family, polypeptide A2                  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |Cyp4b1   |protein_coding |    14806|-1.65 |1.90e-10 |cytochrome P450, family 4, subfamily b, polypeptide 1              |
#> |ENSMUSG00000061906 |Ugt2b38  |protein_coding |     7413|-1.98 |7.50e-10 |UDP glucuronosyltransferase 2 family, polypeptide B38              |
